XFL/PAM.Name: Check XFL Errors
XFL/PAM.Description: Scan through an XFL and find any potential errors it might have

XFL/PAM.Name: Rename All Layers
XFL/PAM.Description: Go through every layer and rename them either by number or used library item

XFL/PAM.Name: Split Multi-library Item Layers
XFL/PAM.Description: Split up layers that use multiple different library items

XFL/PAM.Name: Offset Sprite Positions
XFL/PAM.Description: Go through every element in a symbol and offset it by a certain amount in each direction

XFL/PAM.Name: Remake XFL data.json
XFL/PAM.Description: Go through all the bitmaps in an XFL, remake data.json with them with recalculated dimensions
XFL/PAM.Output: XFL data.json with updated sprite information

XFL/PAM.Name: Switch XFL Type
XFL/PAM.Description: Switch XFLs from either a split label type to a nonsplit version or vice-versa

XFL/PAM.Name: Remove Empty Layers
XFL/PAM.Description: Delete any layers without any elements in a symbol or XFL

XFL/PAM.Name: Convert Newspaper Zombie XFL
XFL/PAM.Description: Adjust XFLs from Newspaper Zombie into an XFL convertable into a PAM

PACKAGES.Name: Edit Worldmap Positions
PACKAGES.Description: Edit the position of all of the pieces of a worldmap by a certain amount

PACKAGES.Name: Organize Plant JSONs
PACKAGES.Description: Reorder all plant related files by the almanac order determined in Propertysheets
PACKAGES.Output: Plant related JSONs with rearranged order

PACKAGES.Name: Remake OBB data.json
PACKAGES.Description: Remakes an OBB data.json with current SCGs in the packet folder
